summary: A woman finds the key to a room in the attic that her husband forbids her from entering. When she opens the door, she is confronted with the haunting existence of the woman her husband refuses to forget.
cast: Leon Lai|Rene Liu|Bingbing Fan|Songzi Xu|Yuzhi Zheng|Ben Niu|Koan Hui|Lei Zhao|Li Qian
title: Xin zhong you gui
